title: BeyoncÃ© Went to a Basketball Game Last Night with Her Family, but Blue Ivy Was the Real Star - Blue Ivy Stole the Show at NBA All-Stars Game
text:
Last night, the whole Carter family took in an NBA All-Star game in New Orleans. BeyoncÃ© and Jay Z sat courtside, along with their five-year-old daughter Blue Ivy, People reports. Blue Ivy's parents are two of the biggest stars in the world, but she completely stole the show at the game.
Let's start with Blue's look, which was epic. She wore a children's broderie anglaise dress from Gucci that costs $1,790, aka more than many adults' monthly rent.
 Children's broderie anglaise dress Price tag: $ 1,790 #Blue #Gucci ðŸ’™ðŸ’š â€”â€”â€” Shoes: CONVERSE CHUCK TAYLOR ALL STAR LOW TOP Price tag: $ 35
A post shared by BeyoncÃ© (@beylite) on Feb 20, 2017 at 5:46am PST
Of course, Billboard reports that Bey wore a Gucci kimono that costs $21,945, so there's a chance Blue Ivy actually felt underdressed.
